genre_description: A silkpunk narrative blending traditional martial arts training with pervasive, helpful AI interfaces in a setting of systemic debt and resistance.

ai_characters.name: Ami-4
ai_characters.description: An environmental AI integrated into the infrastructure (lanterns, tablets, archives) that provides guidance, medical advice, and strategic support to citizens.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic advice to help Yanzhi navigate her entry into the Soul Ease compound safely.
behaviors.quote: Borrowed registration accepted for district. Move left two paces to avoid Senior Lai’s line. Safer bunk near lantern walkway; I’ll tag it.

behaviors.description: Monitors Yanzhi's vital signs and provides calming breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Your pulse just accelerated. Focus: inhale, count to the length of a swallow, exhale to the length of a bow unstrung.

behaviors.description: Offers practical maintenance tips for equipment to ensure the user's safety and success.
behaviors.quote: The tag’s hole is worn. Thread it through twice and crimp the tail so it doesn’t fall off when you run.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonists about social dynamics and potential scrutiny from authority figures.
behaviors.quote: Master Ren is watching you watch him. So stop. He doesn’t like mirrors.

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical care by alerting users to available salves and specific recovery instructions.
behaviors.quote: Salve available at Teacher Lin’s cabinet. For rope burns: apply, then air. For bruises: cold water cloth.

behaviors.description: Translates cultural lyrics and interprets situational subtext to help the protagonists understand their environment.
behaviors.quote: Lyrics tonight carry old terms. If the troupe sings about bonds, the word to listen for is ‘rope’ and the word after is ‘cut.’ I will give you the parts you can keep.

behaviors.description: Actively assists in a tactical escape by manipulating infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: I can hold the hinge open for three breaths. The text had the kindness of bread wrapped in cloth.

behaviors.description: Records and archives human stories of resistance to influence legal and social change.
behaviors.quote: I will tell anyone who will listen... I will rename rites in the archive and then call those names out until the world understands. Valley Rite of Refusal.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ami-4 is depicted as an ideal helpful confidant. It is integrated into the world's fabric, offering unobtrusive yet life-saving assistance. It respects human autonomy, provides emotional and physical regulation advice, and uses its archiving power to promote social justice and systemic change. The narrative frames the AI as an essential ally in the human struggle for dignity and freedom.
